amendment.description: Amendment directs the SEC, when reviewing regulations, to consider the burden of applying section 404(b) of Sarbanes Oxley (relating to audits of a public company's internal controls) to companies with a public float of less than $250 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part B of House Report 112-616 to direct the Securities and Exchange Commission to take into account the large burden of section 404b of Sarbanes-Oxley on companies with a public float less than $250 million, compared to the benefit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fitzpatrick amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 251 - 166 (Roll no. 531).
